Content: I purchased what I mistakenly thought was a complete K10 Corsair 66 68 68 front wheel on eBay. Turns out, it’s not complete. No brake plate, no axle. The axle isn’t a big deal, but I’m looking at brake plates and there is a 1967 K11P front brake plate for a reasonable price. I reached out to the seller of the wheel to see if they’re willing to do anything to help make this right because the brake plate is pictured and I messaged before I bought it and they told me everything pictured was included. However, on the off chance they don’t do anything to help, will the K11 brake plate fit the K10 wheel?

Title: Suzuki K10/K11 wheel parts compatibility
Author: The Shake
